# Source: https://docs.vllm.ai/en/stable/usage/

# Using vLLM[Â¶](#using-vllm "Permanent link")

First, vLLM must be [installed](../getting_started/installation/) for your chosen device in either a Python or Docker environment.

Then, vLLM supports the following usage patterns:

-   [Inference and Serving](../serving/offline_inference/): Run a single instance of a model.
-   [Deployment](../deployment/docker/): Scale up model instances for production.
-   [Training](../training/rlhf/): Train or fine-tune a model.
